title: Reksai's Teraforming guide? idk anymore
body:
So i was laggin rly bad dis game and probably even costed the match for my teammates and so reksai decides to do w/e the heck this is coz she don't give a damn no more.
Just ignore my cs and deaths, give a lagger a break XD ping 800+ then drops to 40 then again a vicous cycle of ping tsunami's

replies.body:
lol nice

Though you shouldn't do that if your team-mates still want to try and win. You can still play while lagging, even if all you can do is split push.
lol i was helping, i just respawned coz lux hit me once wid her ult and i died. w/e i lagg i usually defend base :D
